hours_text:
Welcome to The Dalí Museum in St. Petersburg, FL—home to a world-class collection of works by celebrated artist Salvador Dalí.

**Gallery Admission** includes access to the permanent collection, special exhibitions, Café, Store and Avant-garden. 

**Gallery Admission +****Dome** includes all-day Gallery Admission plus timed access to one (1) of our current immersive digital experiences.

* * *

## **Ticket Prices**

| **Gallery**  
**Admission**| **Dome Add-On  
 _(per show)_**  
---|---|---  
**Adult**(Age 18-64)| $32| $15  
****Local Adult** (on-site only)| $29| $15  
***Discounted Adult**(Senior age 65+, Educator, Fire, Police, Military)| $29| $15  
****Local Discounted Adult** (on-site only)| $26| $15  
***Discounted Student**(Teens age 13-17, college age 18+)| $22| $15  
**Youth** (Age 6-12)| $12| $15  
**Child******(5 and younger)| FREE| FREE  
**Museum Members**|  FREE| $15  
**Groups** (Parties of 10+)| [**Rates here**](http://web.archive.org/web/20251227154055/https://thedali.org/visit/groups-tours/groups/)| [**Rates here**](http://web.archive.org/web/20251227154055/https://thedali.org/visit/groups-tours/groups/)  
  
### **specials**

| **Gallery**  
**Admission**| **Dome Add-On  
 _(per show)_**  
---|---|---  
***Thu after 5pm:** Adult (18-64), Senior (65+), Teen (13-17)| $16| $15  
***Thu after 5pm:** Youth (6-12)| $10| $15  
***Thu after 5pm:** Children (5 and younger)| FREE| FREE  
  
*IDs will be checked at admission.  
**Local rates apply to Pinellas and Hill...

collections_text:
## **Discover the Dalí Museum**   
**in St. Petersburg, Florida**

[Plan your visit](/web/20260114233131/https://thedali.org/visit/) and view an unparalleled collection of works by renowned artist Salvador Dalí, from iconic melting clocks to imaginative visual illusions and avant-garde symbols. Shop, play, wander and quench your curiosity for all that is Salvador Dalí and beyond. 

## [Dalí Alive 360°, On View  Step into the mesmerizing world of Salvador Dalí as art comes to life like never before. This multisensory art experience envelops visitors in 360 degrees of light and sound within The Dali Dome, playing daily starting at 10:30am.  ](/web/20260114233131/https://thedali.org/exhibit/dali-alive-360/)

## [Alberto Giacometti & Salvador Dalí, On View A collaboration between The Dalí Museum and Fondation Alberto et Annette Giacometti in Paris, this groundbreaking exhibition marks the first time these two iconic artists have been presented in a comparative setting in the United States. ](/web/20260114233131/https://thedali.org/exhibit/alberto-giacometti-and-salvador-dali/)

## [Van Gogh Alive 360°, On View For the first time in a monumental 360-degree dome format, immerse yourself in the world’s most visited multi-sensory experience, where Van Gogh’s masterpieces come to life.  ](/web/20260114233131/https://thedali.org/van-gogh-alive-360/)
